data.name: Our Dying World Demo
data.detailed_description:
Our Dying World is a story-driven RPG made using the RPG Maker software. Follow Max and his friend Ryker as they try to grow in strength by setting off from their home village to become adventurers! Dark times however are just up ahead, find out why magic is slowly vanishing from Elorant and see how many friends you can save by the end.

Features
    • A fully voice-acted main story. Our game is fully voice-acted for every story cutscene and heart-to-heart event!

    • Heart To Heart events. Heart-to-heart events are ones that can find while exploring the world. Doing them will improve your relationship with your party and help you get a better ending.

    • Important choices. During some sections of the main story and heart-to-heart events, you have to decide an option that will affect your party members' standing with you and the other members involved. Hurting a relationship enough can cause a death or even affect the entire ending.

    • Secret Legendary Bosses. In each chapter of the game, there will be one secret legendary boss you can fight, if you're brave enough that is.

data.short_description: A fully voice-acted RPG where your choices will determine the ending. Discover why magic is slowly fading from Elorant and see how many of your friends you can save by the end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: 1280x720 Display Resolution, OpenGL 2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 Display Resolution, OpenGL 2.0 or higher

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains:
Fantasy Violence
Alcohol References
Tobacco References
Simulated Gambling
Blood
Suggestive Themes
Mild Language
